mapper.select: select * from spring_mysql.BOARDS WHERE 1=1 AND PK_BOARDS = #{PK_BOARDS};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spring_mysql.BOARDS (PK_BOARDS, TITLE, CONTENTS, WRITER_ID, CREATE_DATE, PARENT_BOARDS) VALUES (#{PK_BOARDS}, #{TITLE}, #{CONTENTS}, #{WRITER_ID},NOW(),#{PARENT_BOARDS}) ;
mapper.delete: DELETE spring_mysql.VISITORS, spring_mysql.BOARDS FROM spring_mysql.VISITORS JOIN spring_mysql.BOARDS ON VISITORS.PK_BOARDS = BOARDS.PK_BOARDS WHERE VISITORS.PK_BOARDS = #{PK_BOARDS};
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VISITORS WHERE PK_BOARDS = #{PK_BOARDS}
mapper.delete: DELETE VISITORS, BOARDS FROM BOARDS INNER JOIN VISITORS ON VISITORS.PK_BOARDS = BOARDS.PK_BOARDS WHERE BOARDS.PK_BOARDS = #{PK_BOARDS}
